name: pegasus_heroes|Button_Name_Barclay_HeroicCharge_Button
tooltip:
Leaps to target location, dealing <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinLeap_ImpactDamageRadius.amount" style="Blue"/> damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinLeap_ImpactStun.duration" style="Blue"/> seconds.

Does not leap over unpathable terrain.
